QuestData.Title: Zen Healing
QuestData.Description: Your friend Taylor is in critical shape. Unfortunately, his wounds are tainted by hozen poison, which is very difficult to cure.$B$BLuckily, through many generations of fighting the hozen, my people have developed medicines to treat such injuries.$B$BThe flowers growing on the surface of Glass Lake are needed to make the antidote.$B$B$n, go quickly and bring back some blooms. Your Admiral's life depends on it.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mishka at Pearlfin Village in the Jade Forest.
